1.title: Gator Nation
1.plot: From the swamps of the Everglades to the shores of the Arctic and the deserts of Arizona - travel the nation for an in-depth look at the alligator, polar bear and Gila monster.

2.title: Turkey Gangs of New York
2.plot: Travel the country for an up-close look at feral turkeys in New York, stealthy bobcats in South Carolina, mighty blue whales off the coast of California and mating elk in Colorado.

3.title: Wolves of Wall Street
3.plot: The United States of Animals is full of unique places for animals to thrive, from New York City to California.

4.title: Bay City Brawlers
4.plot: Hang with feral monkeys in Florida and gray wolves in Minnesota. Laugh with sea lions in California and gallop with wild ponies in Maryland.

5.title: Rocky Mountain High
5.plot: Super-Powered Heroes - bighorn sheep, sea otters, tiny birds and a pod of dolphins - are large and taking charge all across the United States of Animals.

6.title: California Dreamin'
6.plot: A California elephant seal battle and grunion takeover; a Florida whooping crane migration; and a moose swim to breeding bliss in Colorado.

7.title: Cranes, Planes and Automobiles
7.plot: Witness the remarkable migration of the sandhill cranes in Nebraska, a cattle drive in Texas and a bird enthusiast who runs a wild roadside attraction.

8.title: The Other Jersey Shore
8.plot: From horseshoe crabs to Monarch butterflies on the California coast, witness some of the most elusive animal behaviors along the nation's coasts.

9.title: Don't Mess with Texas
9.plot: Visit the largest colony of bats on the planet in Texas, discover the surprising habits of South Florida's sharks and see why Arizona's scorpions do strange and fascinating things with ultraviolet light.

10.title: Wild Wild West
10.plot: Bison thunder across South Dakota's plains during the world's largest bison round-up, while bald eagles fly high at a Maryland dam during a feeding frenzy.

11.title: The West Sting
11.plot: Manatees gather in Florida's coastal waterways, and monk parakeets hang out in a Brooklyn cemetery. Honeybees are dying off, but President Obama is taking up their cause. Donkeys are ruling the streets of an Arizona town they helped build.

12.title: Northern Exposure
12.plot: Watch bison take the flight of their lives, howl at the moon with an elusive predator, and check out an island fox that's making a comeback.

imdb.plot outline: The United States of Animals is your guide to amazing animals doing incredible things around the country. Showcasing the best and most accessible wildlife and revealing secrets behind the fascinating things that animals do, this field guide shows you where and when to go, and what to look for to help you become the wildlife expert you have always dreamed of being.
imdb.title: United States of Animals
plot: The _United States of Animals_ (qv) is your guide to amazing animals doing incredible things around the country. Showcasing the best and most accessible wildlife and revealing secrets behind the fascinating things that animals do, this field guide shows you where and when to go, and what to look for to help you become the wildlife expert you have always dreamed of being.
